welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pantanal, Dominican Republic! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's natural beauty, diverse wildlife, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Pantanal has to offer.

restaurants.name: La Cava (Punta Cava. Wine, Tapas and More)
restaurants.description: La Cava (Punta Cava. Wine, Tapas and More) is a tapas restaurant located in Punta Cana.
restaurants.address: Punta Cana Village (Punta Cana International Airport), 23000 Punta Cana

restaurants.name: Brot Bagels & More
restaurants.description: Brot Bagels & More is a bagel shop located in Punta Cana.

restaurants.name: Wendy’s
restaurants.description: Wendy’s is a fast food restaurant located in Punta Cana.

restaurants.name: Mamma Luisa Bar Trattoria
restaurants.description: Mamma Luisa Bar Trattoria is a italian restaurant located in Punta Cana.
restaurants.address: Galerias de Punta Cana, Punta Cana

restaurants.name: Bachata Rosa (SBG)
restaurants.description: Bachata Rosa (SBG) is a new american restaurant located in Punta Cana.
restaurants.address: Boulevard Turistico Esquina Carretera Juanillo, 23000 Punta Cana
